name: Co-op Shooter
description:
A co-op shooter test ground made in Unity for a University Project.

WASD keys to Move.

Left Click to Shoot.

Mouse to Aim.

To play, input a Player Name, a Room Name, and a Room Size to create a room. Or, enter a Player Name and select to show Available Rooms or select to join a Random  Open Room.

Utilises Photon to allow for multiplayer
